channel.title: GBA emulators
channel.description: what's the best GBA rom emulator?

item.title: GBA emulators
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

I have Poke-mon Chrystal for my PC… Don’t play it though But I use Visual Boy Advance I think too. I would have to check. But a fun game is Super Mario Brothers World. Get an SNES Rom and get it, its a hell of a lot of fun.

item.title: GBA emulators
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“Immortal Technique, post:25, topic:407918”][quote author=ziplock link=topic=509205.msg3696453#msg3696453 date=1312467786]

gba emulators are so stupid they run terribly and you can get the same kind of gameplay from a flash game at miniclip.

Yeah I don’t know what you’re talking about. Unless your computer is sitting on a single core 300GHz processor with a block of wood in your RAM slots, then it should run perfectly fine. Hell, the emulator on my Android even works exceptionally great, and they have save states which is wonderful.
[/quote]

what’s ghz[/quote]

Totally meant Megahertz. It’s the speed of the processor. Well… A unit of speed.

Read full topic

[/quote]

Yeah I don’t know what you’re talking about. Unless your computer is sitting on a single core 300GHz processor with a block of wood in your RAM slots, then it should run perfectly fine. Hell, the emulator on my Android even works exceptionally great, and they have save states which is wonderful.[/quote]

what’s ghz

item.title: GBA emulators
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:23, topic:407918”][quote author=mcbeans link=topic=509205.msg3694382#msg3694382 date=1312334226]
gba emulators are so stupid they run terribly and you can get the same kind of gameplay from a flash game at miniclip.
[/quote]

Yeah I don’t know what you’re talking about. Unless your computer is sitting on a single core 300GHz processor with a block of wood in your RAM slots, then it should run perfectly fine. Hell, the emulator on my Android even works exceptionally great, and they have save states which is wonderful.[/quote]
Not even that. My PSP is overclockable to 333mhz at best. The ram you ask? The gba emulator i use cannot tap into more than 32mb of that ram. Performance is NOT(hardly effected by at least) based on your hardware but how well it is programmed. I can even play some N64 games without lag, but the emulator is still in its alpha phase.

Read full topic

item.title: GBA emulators
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

BAH humbug. Why play GBA on the computer when I can play GB/GBC/GBA/NES/SNES/N64 and even run Win3.1, Win95, Win98(lite) on my psp lol. I am working on modding the dosbox emulation a bit though to be able to tap into the full 64MB of RAM the psp has.

Anyways, the best ROM site I use is:
http://doperoms.com/

Unless I need a PSP rom, then I use:
http://psp-isoz.com

Read full topic
